original: Blom, Gideon Emanuel, direktör, Norrköping, f. 22/12/95 i Börstil, Sthlms 1., av godsäg. Aug. B. o. Olivia Persson. G. 20 m. Dagmar Alexandersson. Barn: Ulla f. 21, Ingrid 22, Mats 25, Barbro 30. — Lantbr:- o. hand:utbildn. Res. i de nord. länd. Förvalt. 19-24, tj :man h. Sörml. Lantmännens Centr:fören. i Nyköp. 25-31, dir. o. sekr. h. Östgöta-Lantmännens Centr:fören. i Norrköp. sed. 32. Lantbr :0’mb. i hush :sällsk., led. av styr. f. östergötl. fröodl :fören., A-B Kvarntorpskalk, Östgöta-Lantmännens Maskin A-B o. A-B K. A. Sundström. Medl. av Rotarykl. o. Odd Fellow. Hobbies: jakt o. fiske. RVO, RFinl-LOlkl, PatrGM, MannerheimM.
translated: Blom, Gideon Emanuel, director, Norrköping, b. 22/12/95 in Börstil, Stockholm County, son of landowner August B. and Olivia Persson. Married in 1920 to Dagmar Alexandersson. Children: Ulla b. 1921, Ingrid b. 1922, Mats b. 1925, Barbro b. 1930. He received agricultural and business education, with residence in the northern regions. He worked as a farm manager from 1919-1924 and then as a manager and secretary for the Södermanland Farmers' Central Association in Nyköping from 1925-1931. He has been director and secretary for the Östergötland Farmers' Central Association in Norrköping since 1932. Additionally, he has been a board member for the Östergötland seed cultivation association, Kvarntorpskalk, Östergötland Farmers' Machinery, and K. A. Sundström. He is a member of the Rotary Club and Odd Fellow. His hobbies include hunting and fishing. He has received the following honors: RVO, RFinl-LOlkl, PatrGM, MannerheimM.
